attributes.action: The resignation of Theresa May & Amber Rudd & investigation into the Home Office
attributes.background: I call for the resignation of Amber Rudd as a result of her management of the Windrush scandal & Theresa May who started this ugly ball rolling when she was Home Secretary resulting in the appalling treatment of Commonwealth residents of Britain. Also an in depth investigation of The Home Office.

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP and/or Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
